Ranging in severity from a background level of worry to an overpowering force, anxiety can lead to difficulty sleeping, a racing heart, panic attacks, fatigue, digestive upset, sweating or headaches - interfering with your ability to live your life. While anxiety can often feel insurmountable, there are several worry-busting habits you can develop to help minimize its effects.
